main.heading: Description
main.body: The Trehan Empire is a nation comprised mostly of humans which sits on the western half of the island of Nentovarr, in the Iberandir region.

main.heading: Description
main.body: Blindshore is a town located in western Nentoris near the Carigorn Escarpment and south of Matha. It is notable for the near-constant mist that shrouds the town and its coast, which is what gives it its name.
